value:
They say all kinds of things about me
in the Leicester Alliance, but there
are plenty of folks as strong as I am.

The truth is, I am rather frustrated to
be here. The flames of war spread
across Fódlan. Hilda needs me!

You need training. I can protect you
while I'm here, but you need to be
able to defend yourself when I'm not.

Got any enemy encampments you
need scouted? I can handle it! I'll just
take out all the enemies myself.

Poring over some strategies, I see.
These tactical treatises look much
different than the ones in Fódlan.

My name is Holst! I have arrived with
a message for you. It is from your
friend $Nf. Here!
That was a valuable experience.
There's always room for improvement.
That could've gone better...
This power will help me soar!

Hilda?! I—oh. Hello. I'm not sure what
is going on here, but let me introduce
myself. I am Holst Sigiswald Goneril.

I've noticed you taking the time to
train lately. I've been very impressed
with what I've seen.$k$pA well-honed body leads to a sharp
mind and a healthy spirit, as I'm sure
you would agree.$k$pNo doubt overseeing all these Heroes
in the field is a demanding task. The
burden on you must be immense.$k$pNow that I've seen what you've got,
though...I'm not worried.$k$pI know you can handle it.$k$pEven so, if you ever need a hand, feel
free to lean on me. I'll be right here,
ready and willing to help you out!
Your luck's run out!
I can't be stopped!
Better run while you can!
You're finished!
Live by the sword…
There's no weapon I can't handle, but a sword does feel best.
Huh? ...If you can sneak up on me, you aren't half bad.
Nothing fires me up like a fight with a strong opponent!
There's no better teacher than fighting in a real battle. Don't you think?
I love to cook with mushrooms. Why don't you let me make you dinner?
Hilda... *sigh* I worry about her.
If you need to borrow my strength, it is yours.
All right.
What was that?
To battle.
